title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Pt.1 Ryen Russillo on Zion Criticism, Rodgers IG Drama and Favre Parallels
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Pt.1 Ryen Russillo on Zion Criticism, Rodgers IG Drama and Favre Parallels
description:
Colin explains how "The Netflix Effect" is killing NBA ratings, how the physical style of the 80's and 90's NBA was good for the league, and what Aaron Rodgers most recent cryptic Instagram post says about its author (3:00).

Then, Ryen Russillo - Host of the Ryen Russillo Podcast - joins Colin for the first part of a two part interview. They discuss the growing negative narrative surrounding Zion Williamson (13:00), why All-Star Games are Nikola Jokic's kryptonite (20:00), if Colin would be a good NBA GM (24:00), what's behind the Aaron Rodgers Instagram drama (32:00), if the constant distractions decrease his trade value (35:00), and if Green Bay's ownership void has caused Aaron Rodgers to become like Brett Favre (40:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
